title: Issue With Client After Patch 6.15
body:
I am having an issue with the League of Legends client after the Patch 6.15 update went live and the servers went down. The next day, I attempted to start up League of Legends but encountered this error.

http://imgur.com/a/Cf3IY

The client doesn't actually start up. I instantly receive the message shown after starting up League of Legends. This occurred after Patch 6.15 went live. I was in a game in which I had to exit because everyone disconnected due to the update. I did not actually install the update either, after the servers went down, the game simply wouldn't start up, therefore I couldn't install Patch 6.15. I thought the issue was affecting a large number if not most people, but it seems my friends are able to start up and play League of Legends just fine. If there are any files or other information that might help with this situation, I'll share it. I would just like some insight on the situation or assistance to fix it.

Edit: I have visited and followed the instructions in Heimy's Workshop.

Edit 2: Uninstalled the game and reinstalled. Installed the necessary files but the game simply won't launch. I am unable to even see the launch screen because of this ever since the issue. I receive the same error message.

replies.body: I have followed the instructions and done what it has told me to do. League of Legends still does not start up and gets the error message shown above.

Same, getting tired of given the same attempts at the problem

Where's a rioter when you need one?

Patcher Kernel errors like this can usually be due to an OS setting blocking your the patcher from launching.  As a first step for your specific issue, go over the instructions in our [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide to get this fixed up.  Let me know your results on this or if you're still have any issues!

I recently fixed this problem through this:

> RESETTING ‘WINSOCK’ THROUGH COMMAND PROMPT
HOW TO RESET WINSOCK:
Press the Windows Key + R
Type cmd
Press “Ok”
Type the following:
netsh winsock reset
Hit Enter
Restart your computer
Re-launch League of Legends

Best Regards~ {{champion:115}}

Open LoL folder than
RADS>Projects>lol_patcher>releases>0.0.0.64(or something like that)>deploy>LoLPatcher 
#{{champion:120}} main
